item.title: Android Apps – 400% growth rate YOY
item.description: Android in numbers â€“ thankfully the Google I/O conference helped out by publishing statistics which give some insight to the growth in adoption of smartphones and also help to provide a hint of reality. But these are BIG BIG BIG numbers. Android Smartphones, Tablets & Devices Over 100M Android devices activated worldwide with 400K activations added every day More than 310 Android devices from 36 different manufactures Android cellphones are on more than 216 mobile carriers in 112 countries Android Market 200,000 free and paid applications available in Android Market 4.
